alert.note: Alert for Adams; Billings; Bowman; Golden Valley; Grant; Hettinger; Sioux; Slope; Stark (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 20 at 2:24AM CDT until October 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON INTO THURSDAY EVENING FOR SOUTHWEST AND FAR SOUTH CENTRAL NORTH DAKOTA... .Critical fire weather conditions across southwestern North Dakota this afternoon and evening. West winds near 20 mph with gusts near 35 mph, and minimum relative humidity values dropping as low as 16 percent, will make any fires that ignite spread rapidly and be difficult to suppress. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHWESTERN NORTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM CDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...West near 20 mph with gusts near 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent. * AFFECTED AREA...Southwest and far south central North Dakota. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite could spread rapidly and become difficult to control or suppress.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Billings; Bowman; Golden Valley; Grant; Hettinger; Sioux; Slope; Stark
